website_summaries.verdict: A fun design that stands out for its novelty and good construction.
pros: Along with its fun look, users appreciate that this is well made and attention-grabbing
Most felt that the center floating cooler kept drinks cold, and it gets bonus points for being larger than some customers expected
cons: A few felt this style didn't keep drinks as cold as they would have liked

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It's a great conversation piece and for the most part does great at keeping drinks cold. My only issue is that the ice and everything in the cooler does sit right on the water so your ice will melt very quickly. I think to remedy that I will be going to the craft store and getting a piece of foam to put in the bottom so there is a bit of a barrier between the water and the ice. Otherwise would totally buy it again. Don't leave it in your pool empty though, it will definitely fly out LOL
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Amos

customer_reviews.title: Fun pineapple float for drinkies
customer_reviews.text: Fun float! Even good for indoor decor. I've updated this review after receiving a prompt replacement from a previous one with a manufacturing defect. Happy that the replacement works great and will provide fun times at gathering and in the hot tub! It is big and sturdy for ice in the middle. Piña colada time!
customer_reviews.author: Creepy Culture

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Accessory For a Summer Day
customer_reviews.text: This cooler looks beautiful floating in the pool and is so practical since it holds several drinks at a time and keeps ice and beverages inside cooler part cold.
customer_reviews.author: MiamiLadyLiving

customer_reviews.title: but so cool!
customer_reviews.text: This item is larger than I thought, but so cool!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: This pineapple is the cutest for any background in pool pictures, and to our surprise, it actually floats and stays pretty much balanced when it’s loaded up!! Big mouth seems like good quality and even came with a patch in case it gets stabbed or otherwise leaks at some point. Would def recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: tiffanaw

customer_reviews.title: It is cute. We used as a centerpiece for ...
customer_reviews.text: It is cute. We used as a centerpiece for a party and it was a big hit. Have not tried it in the pool or lake yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pool parties!
customer_reviews.text: It’s bigger than I expected but great!! We love using it in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it is super cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift and hasn't been used yet, but it is super cute and fun! the recipient loved it!
customer_reviews.author: wen

customer_reviews.title: Another drunk purchase i dont regret
customer_reviews.text: I'll probably never use this magnificent pineapple cooler but hey when that day comes... it shall be refreshing
customer_reviews.author: bri

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, wish it was double insulated on the bottom. Ice melts super fast, I added foam peanuts to the bottom and works 10 time better, I get royalties if I see the insulated bottom on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great inflatable cooler
customer_reviews.text: Took this on our family vacation and they loved it. We were concerned with the amount of Alcohol we were going to be able to keep up float because of wait of bottles and ice but surprisingly it manage well. Maybe adding a strap for a bottle opener would be really helpfull.
customer_reviews.author: Elbert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is so fun and cute for the pool. works great!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Recker

customer_reviews.title: Large! Party time pineapple!
customer_reviews.text: Humongous! Perfect for a pool! Too big for a hot tub. Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
